data.title: The Bridal Closet
data.text:
Where elegance meets affordability

CALL OR EMAIL NOW. APPOINTMENTS ARE REQUIRED. NO WALK-INS PLEASE.

We welcome calls and emails now to schedule your private appointment. All consultations require appointments please.

At The Bridal Closet, our main goal is to provide an enjoyable and productive appointment for our bride-to-be and to help her fulfil her dream of finding the perfect gown to complete her vision for her Special Day. Our appointment guideline will be explained at the time of appointment scheduling. Call 609-693-7057 or email info@thebridalcloset.net now for information or to schedule your appointment.

Remember: Purchase your gown and bridal accessories stress-free. Buy new, authentic, designer wedding gown samples up to 1/2 off the MSRP. Find the gown of your dreams and take it home today.

We also carry the current line of DaVinci Bridal’s flagship line, DaVinci Bridal offering 4 – 6 week turnaround on most in-stock standard orders.

The Bridal Closet, your source for stress-free, enjoyable wedding gown shopping.

The Bridal Closet

Where Elegance Meets Affordability
